item.title: Vincent add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Au milieu de l'hiver, j'ai découvert en moi un invincible été." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Vincent add a quote by Mortimer J. Adler
item.description: "A good book deserves an active reading. The activity of reading does not stop with the work of understanding what a book says. It must be completed by the work of criticism, the work of judging. The undemanding reader fails to satisfy this requirement, probably even more than he fails to analyze and interpret. He not only makes no effort to understand; he also dismisses a book simply by putting it aside and forgetting it. Worse than faintly praising it, he damns it by giving it no critical consideration whatever." -- Mortimer J. Adler
